title: Define System Architecture
description: Develop a high-level design for the Wave Energy Converter system, considering power conversion efficiency, environmental impact, and scalability.

title: Design Wave Energy Harvesting Mechanism
description: Research and design a wave energy harvesting system that maximizes power extraction with minimal environmental impact.

title: Develop Power Conditioning and Storage Solution
description: Design a power conditioning and storage system to efficiently convert harvested energy into usable electricity and store it for later use.

title: Design User Interface and Control System
description: Create a user-friendly interface and control system for the Wave Energy Converter, allowing users to monitor and manage the device.

title: Create Detailed Technical Specifications
description: Write detailed technical specifications for each component of the Wave Energy Converter system, including dimensions, materials, and performance requirements.
